title: Pete Hegseth
added: In February 2019, Hegseth joked on ''[[Fox & Friends]]'' that he didn't think he had washed his hands in ten years. He explained: "I inoculate myself. Germs are not a real thing. I can't see them, therefore they're not real."<ref>{{cite news |last1=Wolfson |first1=Sam |title='Germs are not a real thing': Fox News host says he hasn't washed hands in 10 years |url=https://www.theguardian.com/media/2019/feb/11/germs-are-not-real-fox-news-host-pete-hegseth |work=The Guardian |date=11 February 2019}}</ref>
